Text:
@swmansion @elixirlang Announcing Popcorn, a new library that makes Elixir work in browsers!🍿

Over the last few months, @swmansion  has been contributing to AtomVM, a tiny ErlangVM, and building a machinery around it to make a feasible solution for running @elixirlang in WebAssembly. And now it’s possible with Popcorn, just in a few simple steps 🔥

What a way to start this year’s @ElixirConfEU ! 🚀

#ElixirConf #ElixirConfEU #ElixirLang
RetweetedStatusFullText:

What a way to start this year’s @ElixirConfEU ! 🚀

#ElixirConf #ElixirConfEU #ElixirLang

Text: WASMビルドしたAtomVM（alt-ErlangVM実装）上でElixirコードを動かしつつ、JS-interopのためのAPIも提供するライブラリらしい https://twitter.com/ElixirMembrane/status/1922924025040244813

マジでこれ

> とにかく、なんとなく関係しているふうを装って、自分が一番興味のある話題、自分の中にある知識を、深く熱く、書き散らす
